document_data.name: The Slide
document_data.mainbody: '''The Slide''' was a small steep side road located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The Slide was found in southern Waterdeep within the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]]. It originated on [[Belnimbra's Street]] near the intersection with [[Eel Street (Waterdeep)|Eel Street]] and branched south and east, cutting the main intersection with [[Sakiir's Street]] to connect with that road several buildings to the south.
document_data.History: The road derived its name from the icy and slick conditions it experienced during the winter months. When ice combined with the street's steep incline, pedestrians often went for an unplanned ride.
